2634.verse: أُذِنَ|Permission is given|143|158|12104$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|137|750$يُقَـٰتَلُونَ|are being fought|129|158|12105$بِأَنَّهُمْ|because they|110|139|607$ظُلِمُواْ‌ۚ|were wronged.|118|133|9966$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|128|713$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|112|184$عَلَىٰ|for|63|122|52$نَصْرِهِمْ|their victory|101|160|12106$لَقَدِيرٌ|(is) surely Able.|124|154|12107$

2635.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|99|20$أُخْرِجُواْ|have been evicted|143|158|12108$مِن|from|50|65|53$دِيَـٰرِهِم|their homes|97|112|800$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|85|612$حَقٍّ|right|56|71|2714$إِلَّآ|except|65|80|86$أَن|that|48|55|655$يَقُولُواْ|they said,|86|92|4219$رَبُّنَا|"Our Lord|81|94|1253$ٱللَّهُ‌ۗ|(is) Allah."|88|101|123$وَلَوْلَا|And if not|85|98|2238$دَفْعُ ٱللَّهِ|Allah checks|102|115|2239$ٱلنَّاسَ|the people,|95|108|446$بَعْضَهُم|some of them|110|116|2240$بِبَعْضٍ|by others|84|112|813$لَّهُدِّمَتْ|surely (would) have been demolished|265|321|12109$صَوَٲمِعُ|monasteries|99|155|12110$وَبِيَعٌ|and churches|109|137|12111$وَصَلَوَٲتٌ|and synagogues|127|138|12112$وَمَسَـٰجِدُ|and masajid -|110|132|12113$يُذْكَرُ|is mentioned|103|125|12114$فِيهَا|in it|54|76|253$ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ|(the) name of Allah|148|170|5979$كَثِيرًا‌ۗ|much.|72|83|275$وَلَيَنصُرَنَّ ٱللَّهُ|And surely Allah will help|182|209|12115$مَن|(those) who|101|155|76$يَنصُرُهُۥٓ‌ۗ|help Him.|103|157|12116$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|124|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|80|184$لَقَوِىٌّ|(is) surely All-Strong,|162|373|12117$عَزِيزٌ|All-Mighty.|91|302|1827$

2636.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who,|97|105|20$إِن|if|44|60|225$مَّكَّنَّـٰهُمْ|We establish them|142|158|5424$فِى|in|48|64|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|108|100$أَقَامُواْ|they establish|113|129|5124$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|99|38$وَءَاتَوُاْ|and they give|111|125|2491$ٱلزَّكَوٲةَ|zakah|86|114|441$وَأَمَرُواْ|and they enjoin|123|151|12118$بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ|the right|123|151|1553$وَنَهَوْاْ|and forbid|86|114|12119$عَنِ|from|54|68|1663$ٱلْمُنكَرِ‌ۗ|the wrong.|92|133|3146$وَلِلَّهِ|And for Allah|104|187|1070$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(is the) end|98|181|3299$ٱلْأُمُورِ|(of) the matters.|133|174|12120$

2639.verse: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ|And the inhabitants|150|175|12126$مَدْيَنَ‌ۖ|(of) Madyan.|106|156|6584$وَكُذِّبَ مُوسَىٰ|And Musa was denied,|168|218|12127$فَأَمْلَيْتُ|so I granted respite|151|176|9471$لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|to the disbelievers,|147|158|236$ثُمَّ|then|50|71|293$أَخَذْتُهُمْ‌ۖ|I seized them,|114|135|9472$فَكَيْفَ|and how|76|97|2727$كَانَ|was|57|78|913$نَكِيرِ|My punishment.|124|135|12128$

2634.verse: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.

2635.verse: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

2636.verse: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.

2637.verse: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],

2638.verse: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot

2639.verse: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

2640.verse: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.

2641.verse: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
